item.title: CVE-2024-35641|2024-06-03T06:54:27.398Z -- GregRoss -- Just Writing Statistics
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in GregRoss Just Writing Statistics allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Just Writing Statistics: from n/a through 4.5.
